doctor.name: Dr. Shahzia Alam
doctor.specialty: Blood Diseases, Blood Cancer & Hemato Oncology Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Shahzia Alam is a Hematologist in Narayanganj. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Hematology). She is a Consultant, Hematology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Shahzia Alam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 7pm to 8pm (Sun, Tue & Thu).
